Package org.apache.wayang.core.plan.executionplan

Class ExecutionStage

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.plan.executionplan.ExecutionStage
public class ExecutionStage extends Object
Resides within a PlatformExecution and represents the minimum execution unit that is controlled by Wayang.

The purpose of stages is to allow to do only a part of work that is to be done by a single PlatformExecution and invoke a further PlatformExecution to proceed working with the results of this stage. Also, this allows to consume data with a PlatformExecution only when it is needed, i.e., at a deferred stage. However, the level of control that can be imposed by Wayang can vary between Platforms

Note that this class is immutable, i.e., it does not comprise any execution state.
